sourcesContent: import styled from 'styled-components' import placeholderImg from './img/placeholder.png' const ListItem = ({ id, thumbnail, title, handleSelect }) => ( handleSelect(id)}> { e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = placeholderImg }} // Still returns 404 error if img url is invalid !!! alt={`thumbnail`} /> {title} ) export default ListItem
